theme_strategy.description: A grounded, agricultural aesthetic that balances the raw nature of farming with the precision of modern seed technology. The design should feel 'sunny' and 'abundant'.

typography.instructions: Use 'Outfit' for all major headings to give a distinct, slightly tech-forward but friendly look. Use 'DM Sans' for body copy for maximum legibility on low-end devices. Use 'Syne' sparingly for large numbers or decorative innovation quotes.

primary.name: IFS Green
primary.usage: Primary buttons, active states, key branding elements.

accent.name: Harvest Gold
accent.usage: Call-to-actions (Add to Cart), sale badges, notifications.

background.name: Soil White
background.usage: Main page background. Avoid pure white #FFFFFF.

buttons.primary: bg-[#15803d] text-white hover:bg-[#166534] shadow-lg hover:shadow-green-900/20 transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-semibold
buttons.secondary: bg-[#ecfccb] text-[#365314] hover:bg-[#d9f99d] transition-colors rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium
buttons.outline: border-2 border-[#15803d] text-[#15803d] hover:bg-green-50 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-medium

cards.style: bg-white border border-stone-100 shadow-[0_2px_8px_rgba(0,0,0,0.04)] hover:shadow-[0_12px_24px_rgba(0,0,0,0.06)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden
cards.product_card: group relative bg-white rounded-2xl border border-stone-200 overflow-hidden hover:border-green-300 transition-all

inputs.style: bg-white border-stone-200 focus:border-green-500 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-green-200 rounded-xl h-12 px-4

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays (opacity 0.03) on solid backgrounds to give a 'paper' feel.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffused shadows. Avoid harsh black shadows. Use colored shadows (e.g., shadow-green-900/10).
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use sparingly. Only for sticky nav bars: backdrop-blur-xl bg-white/80 border-b border-stone-200/50.

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 20 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} transition={{ duration: 0.5 }}

hero.description: Aerial view of lush green rice terraces - Hero Background
Drone over lush agricultural field - Innovation Section

people.description: Elderly Indian farmer in field - Trust/Testimonial
Man in field holding crop - About Us

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on green buttons is white (#FFFFFF). Text on amber buttons should be dark (#365314).
accessibility.focus_states: All interactive elements must have a visible ring-2 ring-offset-2 ring-green-600 focus state.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME OVERRIDE: Update 'tailwind.config.js' to use the specific colors defined above (primary: #15803d, accent: #f59e0b). Do not use the default zinc/slate colors.
2. FONT INSTALLATION: You must import 'Outfit' and 'DM Sans' from Google Fonts in index.css.
3. MOBILE FIRST: Design the Product Card to be highly readable on mobile (large 'Add' button, clear price).
4. NO DEFAULT SHADCN LOOK: Override the default radius to 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl'. Remove the default 'border-border' from cards and use subtle shadows instead.
5. IMAGERY: Use the provided image URLs. Do not use placeholders.
6. RAZORPAY: Ensure the checkout flow UI anticipates the Razorpay modal integration.
7. ADMIN PANEL: The admin panel can use a denser layout (Archetype 2 from design system) but must share the same branding colors.
universal_guidelines: Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable. Cramped designs look cheap.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
